title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

reading.title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

passages.content:
Câu 1: What does the passage mainly discuss?
A. States' rights versus federal rights
B. The roles of state and federal governments in the economy of the nineteenth century
C. Regulatory activity by state governments
D. The participation of state governments in railroad, canal, and turnpike construction
Câu 2: The word "effect" in paragraph (A) is closest in meaning to?
A. value
B. influence
C. argument
D. restraint
Câu 3: All of the following are mentioned in the passage as areas that involved state governments in the nineteenth century EXCEPT?
A. manufacturing
B. banking
C. higher education
D. mining
Câu 4: The word "distinct" in paragraph (A) is closest in meaning to?
A. innovative
B. separate
C. provocative
D. alarming
Câu 5: It can be inferred from the first paragraph that in the nineteenth century canals and railroads were _____.
A. much more expensive to build than they had been previously
B. sometimes built in part by state companies
C. built with money that came from the federal government
D. built predominantly in the western part of the country
Câu 6: The regulatory activities of state governments included all of the following EXCEPT?
A. Imposing limits on price fixing
B. Inspecting perishable trade commodities
C. Regulating banking activities
D. Licensing of retail merchants
Câu 7: The word "setting" in paragraph (B) is closest in meaning to?
A. establishing
B. avoiding
C. discussing
D. analyzing
Câu 8: The word "ends" in paragraph (C) is closest in meaning to?
A. decisions
B. goals
C. services
D. benefits
Câu 9: According to the passage, which of the following is true of the Homestead Act of 1862?
A. It was a law first passed by state governments in the West.
B. It established tariffs in a number of regions.
C. It granted settlers easier access to land ownership in the West.
D. It increased the money supply in the West.
Câu 10: Which of the following activities was the responsibility of the federal government in the nineteenth century?
A. Inspection of w

options.D: The participation of state governments in railroad, canal, and turnpike construction

options.B: It established tariffs in a number of regions.
options.C: It granted settlers easier access to land ownership in the West.
options.D: It increased the money supply in the West.

options.B: Determining the conditions under which individuals worked
options.C: Regulation of the supply of money
options.D: Control of the manufacture of gunpowder
